member.name: M:DearCoder.Controllers.APIControllers.PostsAPIController.GetTopXPosts(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will get the most recent X number of Blog Posts
member.param: The number Blog Posts you want.
member.returns: The latest num number of Blog Posts ordered by created (descending).
